amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that new offshore drilling would not conflict with military operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-74 to clarify that new offshore drilling would not conflict with military operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 312).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
